name: Witcher Academy
description:
This is my third game.

It's a mobile game, wich consist in a gesture game. Draw and magic appear :)

Witch art: https://9e0.itch.io/witches-pack

Spell and monster sprites: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720

Gesture Recognizer: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/gesture-recognizer-...
